page.title: 03Golspie-Sporting facilities.
page.content: Although this area has 'natural' sporting and recreational facilities such as hill walking,bird-watching and river and loch fishing,there are various developed sporting activities. Golspie has a fine 18-hole{golf {course},(used in the preliminary rounds of the British Amateur Open 1n 1985.) and has a good in-door{swimming {pool.}It has all weather{tennis courts and an immaculately-kept{bowling {green.}There are many developed{play {areas}and{football pitches}and a{ {go-kart}track can be found in near-by Littleferry.{Pony-trekking}can be found close-by and {hang-gliding}is a popular pastime from the top of Ben Bhraggie. {Badminton,rugby,cricket}and{darts} are all popular locally and some local people regularly take part in the various {Highland Games}in the region.
